alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Glascock; Hancock; Johnson; Laurens; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 11:00AM EST until January 09 at 11:45AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wilkinson County in central Georgia... Northwestern Laurens County in central Georgia... Southeastern Baldwin County in central Georgia... Central Twiggs County in central Georgia... Southeastern Hancock County in east central Georgia... Southwestern Glascock County in east central Georgia... Washington County in east central Georgia... Northwestern Johnson County in east central Georgia... * Until 1145 AM EST. * At 1100 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pancras to near Myricks Mill to Bullard, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Sandersville, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Gordon, Tennille, Ivey, McIntyre, Toomsboro, Oconee, Danville, Mitchell, Allentown, Deepstep, Midway-Hardwick, Marion, Hamburg State Park, Shoals, Downs, and Beulah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for central and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Glascock; Hancock; Johnson; Laurens; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson
